social_events.title: Welcome Reception
social_events.venue: Resorts World at Sentosa Convention Center
social_events.desc: One entry ticket will be included with each full conference registration. To get admission into the event you will need to have your name badge on your person as the QR code that is located on your badge is how the ACL Staff member(s) Scan and account for admission(s). No name badge, no entrance. Social Event tickets can be added on for Guests, Tutorials, Workshops, and Exhibitors to attend at the Registration Solutions Desk or through your Yes Events registration login.
